overview: From 2025-07-20 to 2025-07-21, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 1 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 1 active contributors.

topPRs.title: op-node: ensure proper line continuation with backslashes
topPRs.author: rickck11
topPRs.body:
Updated the command-line example to correctly use backslashes (\) for line continuation.
Previously, `--p2p.listen.tcp and ``--p2p.listen.udp` were not followed by backslashes, which could cause copy-paste issues or shell parsing errors.
This change improves readability and correctness of the example command.

topContributors.summary: rickck11: Focused on documentation improvements, merging a PR in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#16753) that ensured proper line continuation with backslashes. Their primary focus was on other work, specifically within documentation files.
